title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 930.1 - Purpose and Effect of Regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 930.1 - Purpose and Effect of Regulations

State Regulations
(a) The purpose of these regulations is to
establish the procedures and conditions for approval and acceptance of
honoraria by specified New York State officials and employees. (b) The effect of these regulations is to
supersede prior regulations and any advisory opinions or other guidance issued
by predecessor agencies to the Joint Commission on Public Ethics to the extent
such advisory opinions and guidance are inconsistent with this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19

930.1

Adopted, New

York State Register, Volume XXXVI, Issue 24, effective
6/18/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
